p: As for the antihyperglycemic results detailed in Figure 2, during the 12 h period, the different doses did not show any remarkable effect in the management of BGL in a short time. Compared to glibenclamide, the two doses exhibited a very moderate effect. The decrease in FBG stopped between the 6th and 12th hour and started to rise again, indicating the end of the extractâ€™s effect.
